mapper.select: SELECT RV_NO,RV_INFO,MEM_NAME,RV_DATE,PRDT_NAME,PRDT_IMAGE,PRDT_IMAGE_PATH FROM REVIEW RE JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = RE.MEM_CODE) JOIN PRDT PR ON (RE.PRDT_CODE = PR.PRDT_NO)

SELECT RV_NO,RV_INFO,MEM_NAME,TO_CHAR(RV_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RV_DATE2 , PRDT_NAME,RV_COLOR,RV_SIZE,RV_HEIGHT,RV_WEIGHT,PRDT_IMAGE,PRDT_IMAGE_PATH,RV_LIKE FROM REVIEW RE JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = RE.MEM_CODE) JOIN PRDT PR ON (RE.PRDT_CODE = PR.PRDT_NO) WHERE RE.RV_NO = #{rv_no}
